ca.josephroque.bowlingcompanion.utilities

Class StatUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.josephroque.bowlingcompanion.utilities.StatUtils

  • public final class StatUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Joseph Roque on 2015-07-25. Methods and constants for identifying and recording statistics.

    • Method Detail

      • getStatName

        public static java.lang.String getStatName(int statCategory,
                                           int statIndex,
                                           boolean chanceName)
        Gets the name of a stat based on its category and index in that category.
        Parameters:
        statCategory - category of the stat
        statIndex - index of the stat
        chanceName - if true, returns a name which describes the chances the user had to increase the stat, or null if such a name does not exist. If false, returns the name of the stat
        Returns:
        name of the stat or the "chances" name of the stat
